__e: Listen, "Doctor", while we're on me just for a second, my very pregnant ex-wife would like me to take a couple of days off and travel to her mother's house so we can reconnect as a family.
No, no, my ex-wife is, though, and thus my son is, which makes me sort of, well...
The thing is, if she had died one week earlier, my ex-wife would be rich now, and I feel bad about that, because I think she really would've enjoyed being rich.
I'm the one who decides whether your daughter'll get Federal protection... Fuck... Or whether we post your ex-wife's address on the Internet.
Two years we've been together and you never think to mention you're wearing a present from your ex-wife around your fricking neck?
I know he's probably only marrying me so he can get Pennsylvania.
If anybody killed him, it was Sara.
Not his fault the crazy ex-wife showed up out of nowhere.
